alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 12:11AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES THROUGH 130 AM EDT... At 1210 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Watertown to 8 miles north of Redfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Fort Drum, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Glen Park, Herrings, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Black River, Lyonsdale, Greig, Brownville, Copenhagen, Harrisville, and Croghan. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 45 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
